thread.title: Microsoft is booming -- but not for the reason you think
thread.title_full: Microsoft is booming -- but not for the reason you think

title: Microsoft is booming -- but not for the reason you think
text:
Microsoft is booming -- but not for the reason you think 
CNN Money Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Remember the days when Windows and Office were Microsoft's untouchable cash cows? Today's Microsoft is practically unrecognizable from just a few years ago....
